metadata.title: CVE-2024-35296 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Invalid Accept-Encoding header can cause Apache Traffic Server to failcache lookup and force forwarding requests.This issue affects Apache Traffic Server: from 8.0.0 through 8.1.10, from9.0.0 through 9.2.4.Users are recommended to upgrade to version 8.1.11 or 9.2.5, which fixesthe issue.

criterions.comment: trafficserver package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
